name: Stephen A Robertson
coverLetter:
While new to trimming I have been working in production based occupations my whole adult life. 

I have a college degree in electrical technology, which may not lend itself directly to trimming, but I believe gives evidence to my work ethic.

I require nothing other then a steady paycheck., and an opportunity to learn a trade which is growing quickly in the valley (no pun intended). 

I also should add that I have an official resume with work and education history should you want it..
